title: Feature Request: Show blank panel when clicking on disconnected machine
author: OffColour
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->

## Expected Behavior
Single clicking on a disconnected machine in the tree view should show a blank panel instead of staying on the currently connected machine.

## Current Behavior
Clicking on a disconnected machine stays on the machine last used.

## Possible Solution
Single clicking a disconnected machine in the tree view shows a blank panel in the same way as Microsoft's RDCMAN does, maybe with a "connect" button i...

iterations.description: Feature request to show a blank/placeholder panel when selecting a disconnected connection in the tree, improving UX by giving visual feedback instead of showing nothing or stale content.
